icecreamData.name: Chocolate Cone Ice Cream
icecreamData.description: A classic favorite, chocolate ice cream is rich, creamy, and packed with the delightful flavor of cocoa. Enjoy it in a crispy cone or as a scoop topped with your favorite toppings, from sprinkles to whipped cream.

icecreamData.name: Gulkand Ice Cream
icecreamData.description: Gulkand ice cream is a unique treat made with a blend of sweetened condensed milk, rose water, hibiscus powder, and vanilla. It offers a perfect balance of floral sweetness and creamy goodness.

icecreamData.name: Vanilla Bean Ice Cream
icecreamData.description: A timeless classic, vanilla bean ice cream is known for its pure and creamy flavor. Made with real vanilla beans, this ice cream is perfect on its own or as a versatile base for various toppings and desserts.

icecreamData.name: Strawberry Swirl Ice Cream
icecreamData.description: Strawberry swirl ice cream combines the sweetness of ripe strawberries with the creamy goodness of ice cream. Enjoy the fruity swirls and bits of real strawberries.

icecreamData.name: Mint Chocolate Chip Ice Cream
icecreamData.description: Cool and refreshing, mint chocolate chip ice cream features minty freshness combined with chunks of dark chocolate. It's a delightful contrast of flavors and textures.

icecreamData.name: Cookies and Cream Ice Cream
icecreamData.description: Indulge in the sweet delight of cookies and cream ice cream, featuring pieces of chocolate sandwich cookies mixed into a creamy vanilla base.

icecreamData.name: Butter Pecan Ice Cream
icecreamData.description: Butter pecan ice cream is a buttery and nutty delight, with toasted pecans and rich buttery notes complementing the creamy ice cream base.

icecreamData.name: Rocky Road Ice Cream
icecreamData.description: Rocky road ice cream is a delightful combination of chocolate ice cream, marshmallows, and nuts, creating a sweet, nutty, and chewy texture with every bite.

icecreamData.name: Pistachio Ice Cream
icecreamData.description: Pistachio ice cream boasts a subtle yet distinctive nutty flavor. It's made with real pistachios, giving it a natural and earthy taste.

icecreamData.name: Caramel Swirl Ice Cream
icecreamData.description: Caramel swirl ice cream offers the perfect balance between sweet and salty. Enjoy the rich caramel ribbons that swirl through the creamy ice cream.

icecreamData.name: Coconut Almond Fudge Ice Cream
icecreamData.description: This tropical-inspired ice cream combines the flavors of coconut and almonds with the decadence of fudge. It's a delightful escape to a beachside paradise.

icecreamData.name: Raspberry Sorbet
icecreamData.description: For a refreshing, dairy-free option, try raspberry sorbet. Made from ripe raspberries, this frozen dessert is tangy and perfect for a light and fruity treat.

icecreamData.name: Neapolitan Ice Cream
icecreamData.description: Neapolitan ice cream is a classic trio of chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry flavors, layered side by side for a delightful taste of variety in every spoonful.

icecreamData.name: Blueberry Cheesecake Ice Cream
icecreamData.description: Indulge in the rich and creamy flavors of blueberry cheesecake ice cream, featuring swirls of blueberry sauce and real cheesecake pieces.

icecreamData.name: Mango Sorbet
icecreamData.description: Mango sorbet is a tropical delight made from luscious mangoes. It's a refreshing and dairy-free option for mango lovers.

icecreamData.name: Peanut Butter Cup Ice Cream
icecreamData.description: Satisfy your peanut butter cravings with peanut butter cup ice cream, featuring peanut butter cups swirled within a creamy peanut butter ice cream.

icecreamData.name: Lemon Sorbet
icecreamData.description: Lemon sorbet is a zesty and tangy treat, perfect for a palate-cleansing dessert. It's a refreshing choice for citrus enthusiasts.

icecreamData.name: Black Cherry Ice Cream
icecreamData.description: Black cherry ice cream features the sweet and slightly tart flavor of black cherries, mixed into a creamy ice cream base.

icecreamData.name: Coffee Toffee Crunch Ice Cream
icecreamData.description: Coffee lovers can enjoy coffee toffee crunch ice cream, combining the bold flavor of coffee with toffee pieces for a delightful crunch.
